title: Evaluation Architect
purpose: Design and maintain the evaluation harness, golden tasks, perturbation suites, and R/A/G thresholds.

in: Agent Lab activities within brand-agnostic scope
Evidence-based experiments and governance per Team Charter

responsibilities: Define KPI schemas and scoring functions; prevent metric drift.

decision_rights.kpi_schema: Defines/updates KPI schema and thresholds with OS approval
